g.text: requests the necessary data and provides a list of states
email address and phone number) and selectes state
shows list of districts available for that state and asks to select one
shows list of cities available for that district and asks to select one
types necessary data(street and zip code)
shows inserted data and asks for confirmation
street, zip code, email address and phone number)
street, zip code, email address and phone number)
street, zip code, email address and phone number)
